Ratifying #USMCA we will ensure American workers succeed in the #global marketplace.
(4/4) pic.twitter.com/QkJb5uU2p4

•Requiring all trade parties to take measures to prohibit the importation of goods produced by forced #labor.
•Requiring 40-45% of #automotive content be made by workers earning an average base #wage of at least $16 an hour. #USMCA
(3/4) pic.twitter.com/iN0g5yjja1

•Requiring all trade partners to maintain #labor standards as recognized by the International Labor Organization regarding freedom of association, collective bargaining, child labor, and forced labor. #USMCA
(2/4) pic.twitter.com/IcYerrOSIh

Ratifying #USMCA we will ensure the automotive industry continues to invest in the #American economy through new manufacturing and creating more well-paying jobs for American workers. (4/4) pic.twitter.com/F9AbBu98Bp

- Updating the automotive rules of origins by requiring 75% of auto parts be made in North America - stimulating #UnitedStates manufacturing and economic growth.
